name: Unicorn Farts with Silk
description:
A perfect blend of cool peppermint and sweet cotton candy and with over 25% mango and Shea butters this is a real treat!

Each bar is handmade in small batches with loads of skin nourishing ingredients. 

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Palm Kernel Oil, Mango Butter, Shea Butter, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance and/or Essential Oils, Cruelty Free Tussah Silk Fibers, Mineral colorants.

name: Blackberry & Amber with Silk
description:
Fresh ripe blackberries combined with rich, sultry eastern amber. Such a beautiful combination and with over 25% mango and Shea butters this bar is truly decadent!

Each bar is handmade in small batches with loads of skin nourishing ingredients. 

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Palm Kernel Oil, Mango Butter, Shea Butter, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance and/or Essential Oils, Cruelty Free Tussah Silk Fibers, Mineral colorants.

name: Apple Pumpkin Goat Milk Cupcake Soap with Silk
description:
Cutesy lil' cupcake soaps  scented with fresh apples, creamy pumpkin and a spicy cinnamon cake base.Loaded with both Mango and Shea butters and goat's milk--a truly luxurious indulgence. Great for anyone but make great gifts. 

 So whats so special about goats milk soap?  Well goats milk has many benefits.  First goats milk has many vitamins and other essential elements to help nourish skin. These include vitamins A, E, C, some of the B vitamins, amino and citric acids, unsaturated fatty acids and zinc.  

Goats milk is also said to have an effect on troubled skin as soap made from goats milk has the proteins of milk products and these proteins kill acne producing bacteria.  Goats milk soap is also moisturizing as the natural creams in goat's milk soap help keep moisture in skin better than commercial soaps. This is because the commercial brands are mainly chemicals.

Goat's milk soap contains caprylic acid which makes the product a low pH level because it is an alkaline product. This brings the pH closer to human skin and prevents dryness while allowing nutrients to enter the skin.

Goat's milk soap benefits include the lack of alcohol, petroleum or preservatives. This has been thought to reduce skin irritation and itchiness for people with sensitive skin or eczema.

We make no medical claims. Our description should not be mistaken as such.  If you have any questions--please consult your physician. 

Each bar is handmade in small batches with loads of skin nourishing ingredients.  

Ingredients:  Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Palm Kernel Oil, Mango Butter, Shea Butter, Goat Milk, Sodium Hydroxide, fragrance and/or essential oils, Tussah Silk Fibers,mineral colorants.

name: Jack Frost Soap with Silk
description:
Jack Frost is a fresh blend of majestic fir needles, cedar, pine, a twist if citrus and of course cooling peppermint.

Each bar is handmade in small batches with loads of skin nourishing ingredients.  

Ingredients: Saponified oils of Olive, Coconut, Palm Kernel, Mango & Shea Butters, Water, Essential and/or Fragrance oils, mineral colorants, Tussah Silk Fibers.

name: Snow Maiden Soap with Silk
description:
Snow Maiden is a addictive balance of cool mints warmed with exotic, floral vanilla and just a touch of amber.  Please note that peppermint and spearmint essential oils bring a slight cooling sensation to the skin.

Each bar is handmade in small batches with loads of skin nourishing ingredients.  

Ingredients: Saponified oils of Olive, Coconut, Palm Kernel, Mango & Shea Butters, Water, Essential and/or Fragrance oils, mineral colorants, Tussah Silk Fibers.

name: Frankincense & Myrrh with Silk
description:
Nothing reminds me more of the Christmas holiday than Frankincense and Myrrh though it is a deliciously addictive fragrance that is wonderful any time of year.  Earthy, woody and slightly sweet.  Frankincense and Myrrh are both resins of trees growing in the Middle East. In ancient times these resins were used for both medicinal purposes and religious rituals. They were considered indispensable as a lifeline to physical health and spiritual well-being. 

Each bar is handmade in small batches with loads of skin nourishing ingredients.  

Ingredients: Saponified oils of Olive, Coconut, Palm Kernel, Mango & Shea Butters, Water, Essential and/or Fragrance oils, mineral colorants, Tussah Silk Fibers.

description:

This soap is very creamy and enriched with soothing pure mango and shea butters with added silk fibers. Feels like heaven on the skin.

name: Coconut Cream Mess Free Lotion Stick
description:
Solid lotion in a handy mess free tube!  Use anywhere you need a little extra help.  Great for hands, feet, knees and elbows.

This listing is for one stick tube. 

Ingredients: Organic beeswax, Shea and Cocoa Butters, Avocado and Coconut Oil, Fragrance.

name: Essential Oil Face Bar
description:
Essential oil blend, activated charcoal which is known to help remove toxins from the skin, comfrey, aloe vera and carrot seed oil.  Gently cleanses while not over drying your skin.

This listing is for one 4-5 oz bar.

Ingredients: Saponified oils of Olive, Coconut, Palm kernel, Mango and Shea Butters, Essential oils, Activated Charcoal, Comfrey Powder.

name: Spirit Handmade Soap
description:
Sweet, earthy sweet grass combine with cleansing sage and a sprinkle of peppermint leaves. Is that a hint of woodsmoke in the background? Breathe it in, let the heart of this Native American inspired soap uplift your spirit.

This soap is very creamy and enriched with soothing pure mango and shea butters. Feels like heaven on the skin. 

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Palm Kernel Oil, Mango Butter, Shea Butter, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance/Essential Oil Blend, Dried Peppermint Leaves.

name: The Hive Winery's Jacked Apple Beer Soap
description:
Crisp apples in a wickedly delicious bubbly brew. Doesn't get any better than that!  Made with The Hive Winery's very own Stinger Hard Apple Cider--Utah's first cider beer.  Now you don't have to go to the winery to get your bar.  

This listing is for one bar.

Ingredients:  Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Olive Oil, Avocado Oil, Mango butter, Shea Butter, The Hive Winery's Stinger Hard Apple Cider Beer, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance, Mineral Colorant.

name: New Egyptian Dragon with Silk
description:
A sensual blend of exotic amber, frankincense and myrrh, patchouli and hint of florals in the background. So mysterious. Full of skin loving ingredients your skin will surely thank you for. 

This listing is for one big bar weighing approximately 5.5-6 ounces or more.  

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Palm Kernel Oil, Mango Butter, Shea Butter, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance and/or Essential Oils, Cruelty Free Tussah Silk Fibers, Mineral Colorants.

name: Buttercream Goat Milk
description:
Rich, decadent buttercream. The fragrance is part foodie, part comforting, part sensual. Easily one of my favorites and will leave you wanting more.

Goats milk is also said to have an effect on troubled skin as soap made from goats milk has the proteins of milk products and these proteins kill acne producing bacteria.  Goats milk soap is also moisturizing as the natural creams in goat's milk soap help keep moisture in skin better than commercial soaps. This is because the commercial brands are mainly chemicals.

Goat's milk soap contains caprylic acid which makes the product a low pH level because it is an alkaline product. This brings the pH closer to human skin and prevents dryness while allowing nutrients to enter the skin.

Goat's milk soap benefits include the lack of alcohol, petroleum or preservatives. This has been thought to reduce skin irritation and itchiness for people with sensitive skin or eczema.

We make no medical claims. Our description should not be mistaken as such.  If you have any questions--please consult your physician. 

Each bar is handmade in small batches with loads of skin nourishing ingredients.  This listing is for one 3.5-4.5 oz bar.  **If you need more, please convo me.  ;)

Ingredients:  Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Goat Milk, Sodium Hydroxide, fragrance and/or essential oils, mineral colorants.

name: Spicy Lime
description:
Fresh tart Lime with just a touch of spice makes everything oh so nice!!This soap is very creamy and enriched with soothing pure mango and shea butters. Feels like heaven on the skin. 

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Palm Kernel Oil, Mango Butter, Shea Butter, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance and/or Essential Oil, Mineral Colorant, Safflower oil, Palm oil, Black Walnut Hull.

name: New Dragon Fire with Silk
description:
Dragon Fire Handmade Soap. This is a unisex fragrance, even my kiddos love it. Sophisticated, complex and heady are the keys to this magnificent fragrance. The fragrance is so fantastic you'll find layers of musks, ambers, a touch of patchouli, nag champa, cedars to warm and enhance this exotic fragrance, and much more. Easily one of my favorites and will leave you wanting more. 

Each bar is handmade in small batches with loads of skin nourishing ingredients. 

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Palm Kernel Oil, Mango Butter, Shea Butter, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance and/or Essential Oils, Cruelty Free Tussah Silk Fibers, Mineral colorants.

name: Oatmeal Stout Beer Soap
description:
Creamy Oatmeal, Orange Peel, Butterscotch, Farm-fresh Milk, Nutty Almond and Rich Vanilla come together to make this an out of this world fragrance.  Simply mouth watering.

Ingredients:  Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Avocado Oil, Olive Oil, Mango Butter, Shea Butter, Beer, Sodium Hydroxide, fragrance.
